alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 2:46AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 18 inches, mainly at elevations above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for severe winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
